mapper.select: SELECT OD.ORDER_CODE, OD.ORDER_MEANS, OD.ORDER_DATE, OD.STATUS, RV.RE_IDX, OD.ORDER_PRICE, RV.ADAULT_NUMBER, RV.CHILD_NUMBER, RV.BABY_NUMBER, RV.ID, RV.PRODUCT_CODE, RV.PRODUCT_NAME, RV.NATION_NAME, RV.CITY_NAME, RV.DEPARTURE_DATE, RV.ARRIVAL_DATE, RV.TRANSPORTATION FROM (SELECT RE.RE_IDX, RE.ADAULT_NUMBER, RE.CHILD_NUMBER, RE.BABY_NUMBER, RE.ID, RE.PRODUCT_CODE, PR.PRODUCT_NAME, NA.NATION_NAME, CI.CITY_NAME, PR.DEPARTURE_DATE, PR.ARRIVAL_DATE, PR.TRANSPORTATION FROM TA_RESERVATION RE, TA_PRODUCT PR, TA_CITY CI, TA_NATION NA WHERE RE.PRODUCT_CODE = PR.PRODUCT_CODE AND CI.CITY_CODE = PR.CITY_CODE AND NA.NATION_CODE = PR.NATION_CODE) RV, TA_ORDER OD WHERE OD.ORDER_CODE = #{ORDER_CODE} AND RV.RE_IDX = OD.RE_IDX

SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, OD.ORDER_CODE, OD.ORDER_MEANS, OD.ORDER_PRICE, OD.ORDER_DATE, OD.STATUS, RE.ID, PR.PRODUCT_CODE, PR.PRODUCT_NAME FROM TA_RESERVATION RE, TA_PRODUCT PR, TA_ORDER OD WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} AND OD.ORDER_CODE > 0 AND RE.PRODUCT_CODE = PR.PRODUCT_CODE AND RE.RE_IDX = OD.RE_IDX AND OD.STATUS IN('02', '03') ) WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(ORDER_CODE) FROM TA_ORDER WHERE ORDER_CODE > 0 AND STATUS IN('02', '03')

SELECT count(OD.ORDER_CODE) FROM TA_ORDER OD, TA_RESERVATION RE
AND RE.RE_IDX = OD.RE_IDX AND OD.ORDER_CODE > 0 AND OD.STATUS IN('02', '03')
